Name: STAR SOD
About the game: This is a personal project I've been working on by myself for a while. It's a VR Action Shooter that makes you feel like Neo from the matrix. A mysterious group of rogues calling themselves STAR have kidnapped you. In this VR shooter you will right the wrongs of the 'evil' Space Trading Association as you are tasked/forced into suicidal missions. A short concise adventure and a first glimpse into the STA Universe. Dodge bullets and use an arsenal of weapons including a two handed assault rifle and a grenade launcher to dispense justice on those your master determines to be evil.
Meta Title: STAR SOD: Mar 30, 2018, Mass Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on STAR SOD? Check out the release date (Mar 30, 2018), developer insights from Mass Games, and a complete game summary.
